Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.observer

Class ViewObservable

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.observer.ViewObservable
Direct Known Subclasses:
LightMatch
public class ViewObservable extends Object
This class implements the Observable-side of the paradigm. Extended by the LightMatch class which calls these update methods in a certain way, it calls the mirrored methods on the Observer interface an so it will change the View (in position 0 of the observers' array) state each move.

      public void setView​(ViewObserver view)
